channel.title: now on wooly mammoth's mighty absence
channel.description: Recent content in now on wooly mammoth's mighty absence

item.title: /now
item.description: february 28th, 2022: i've rewritten the css/html of the site so that it is now, i think, all mine! i've put this off for ages, having started it early last year and then put it on hold for several months. but it's now new from the ground up, using grid for the layout and with some changes to how the html partials for the site are setup. besides some minor aesthetic tweaks, it doesn't look hugely different on the outside.
